That's somewhat correct. Wingedwarrior, Airly, Dewboy, and I were 
discussing possible futures for the rpg. We were thinking about 
moving to another planet, but there are complications to that, and 
we were thinking of voting for a restart in the rpg. Those who 
haven't read the nbwrpg message boards lately won't have known about 
this.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> 
> 
> > Who is discussing a restart?
> >
> 
> I think what he means is the poll about in what direction NBWRPG 
should move
> (i.e. back to cybertron, another planet, stay here, future earth 
etc.)
